Classes in Quackbot used by Quackbot
Bot
          Bot instance that communicates with 1 server -Initiates all commands Used by: Controller, spawned commands
Bot.ThreadGroupLocal
           
Controller
          Quackbot is an advanced IRC bot framework based off of PircBot.
GUI
          Provides a GUI for bot -Output is formated and displayed -Can initate Reload There should only be 1 instance of this.
InitHook
          An interface for adding Hooks to the Quackbot start process.
PluginType
          The core of any PluginType abstract class.
